author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
name: ToggleSwitch
shortDescription: Toggle switch that users can click or touch.
description: Add this behavior to a shape painter object.
When the toggle switch is in the *left* position, the condition `Checked` is "false". If it is in the *right* position, the condition `Checked` is true.
A halo appears when the mouse hovers near the toggle switch.
Toggle switch cannot be toggled by users if any of these are true:
Toggle switch can always be changed by an action.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Use a shape-painter object to draw a toggle switch that users can click or touch.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ToggleSwitch

events.comment: Fix bad inputs that create malformed toggle switches
Animate the thumb to the right place
Detect hover/touch/click (but only if the layer and object is visible, and the object is not already being dragged)
Detect mouse clicks near track, start dragging
Set inactive track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Set active track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw halo when the mouse is hovering over thumb
Use darker halo while being pressed
Make sure object doesn't get re-drawn every frame

eventsFunctions.name: SetTrackWidth
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the track width of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.name: SetTrackHeight
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the track height of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbOpacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the thumb opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.name: SetInactiveTrackOpacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the inactive track opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.name: SetActiveTrackOpacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the active track opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the halo opacity when the thumb is pressed.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHaloOpacityPressed
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the halo opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change opacity of the halo when the thumb is hovered.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHaloOpacityHover
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the halo opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the offset on Y axis of the thumb shadow.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Thumb shadow offset on Y axis
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbShadowOffsetY
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the offset on Y axis of the thumb shadow of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the offset on X axis of the thumb shadow.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Thumb shadow offset on X axis
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbShadowOffsetX
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the offset on X axis of the thumb shadow of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbShadowOpacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the thumb shadow opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbRadius
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the thumb radius of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.name: SetHaloRadius
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the halo radius of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.description: Change the active track color (the part on the thumb left).
eventsFunctions.name: SetActiveTrackColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the active track color of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the inactive track color (the part on the thumb right).
eventsFunctions.name: SetInactiveTrackColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the inactive track color of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.name: SetInactiveThumbColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the thumb color of _PARAM0_ (when unchecked) to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.name: SetActiveThumbColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the thumb color of _PARAM0_ (when checked) to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: If checked, change to unchecked. If unchecked, change to checked.
eventsFunctions.name: ToggleChecked
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change _PARAM0_ to opposite state (checked/unchecked)

eventsFunctions.name: SetDisabled
eventsFunctions.sentence: Disable _PARAM0_: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.name: SetChecked
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set _PARAM0_ to checked: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Check if mouse is hovering over toggle switch.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Is mouse hovered over toggle switch?
eventsFunctions.name: IsHoveredOver
eventsFunctions.sentence: Mouse is hovering over _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the toggle switch is disabled.
eventsFunctions.name: IsDisabled
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ is disabled

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the toggle switch is checked.
eventsFunctions.name: IsChecked
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ is checked

propertyDescriptors.label: Radius of the thumb (px) Example: 10
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbRadius

propertyDescriptors.label: Active thumb color string. Example:  24;119;211
propertyDescriptors.name: ActiveThumbColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of the thumb. Example: 255
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbOpacity

propertyDescriptors.label: Width of the track (pixels) Example: 20
propertyDescriptors.name: TrackWidth

propertyDescriptors.label: Height of the track (pixels) Example: 14
propertyDescriptors.name: TrackHeight

propertyDescriptors.label: Color string for the track that is RIGHT of the thumb. Example:  150;150;150  (Leave blank to use thumb color)
propertyDescriptors.name: InactiveTrackColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of the track that is RIGHT of the thumb.  Example: 255
propertyDescriptors.name: InactiveTrackOpacity

propertyDescriptors.label: Color string for the track that is LEFT of the thumb. Example:  24;119;211 (Leave blank to use thumb color)
propertyDescriptors.name: ActiveTrackColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of the track that is LEFT of the thumb.  Example: 128
propertyDescriptors.name: ActiveTrackOpacity

propertyDescriptors.label: Size of halo when the mouse hovers and clicks on the thumb. Example: 24
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloRadius

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of halo when the mouse hovers on the thumb. Example: 32
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloOpacityHover

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of the halo that appears when the toggle switch is pressed. Example: 64
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloOpacityPressed

propertyDescriptors.label: Number of pixels the thumb is from the left side of the track.
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbOffset

propertyDescriptors.label: Checked
propertyDescriptors.name: Checked

propertyDescriptors.label: Disabled
propertyDescriptors.name: Disabled

propertyDescriptors.label: State has been changed (used in ToggleChecked function)
propertyDescriptors.name: ToggleChanged

propertyDescriptors.label: Inactive thumb color string. Example:  255;255;255
propertyDescriptors.name: InactiveThumbColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Click or press has started on toggle switch
propertyDescriptors.name: IsPressed

propertyDescriptors.label: Offset (Y) of shadow on thumb.  Positive numbers move shadow down, negative numbers move shadow up. Example: 4
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbShadowOffsetY

propertyDescriptors.label: Offset (X) of shadow on thumb.  Positive numbers move shadow right, negative numbers move shadow left. Example: 0
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbShadowOffsetX

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of shadow on thumb. Example: 32
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbShadowOpacity

propertyDescriptors.label: Need redraw
propertyDescriptors.name: NeedRedaw

propertyDescriptors.label: Is hovered
propertyDescriptors.name: IsHovered

propertyDescriptors.label: Was hovered
propertyDescriptors.name: WasHovered
